name: nicrosil
description: Nicrosil is a high-performance alloy crafted from nickel and chromium. Renowned for its exceptional corrosion resistance and structural integrity, nicrosil excels in challenging environments where durability is paramount.

allomancy.description: Allows {PAWN} to boosts another pawn's next Investiture-related ability drastically, at the downside of completely draining them after.

feruchemy.description: Stores Investiture, enabling storage of magical energy.

store.description: This pawn is storing their Investiture in a nicrosil metalmind. Their spiritual connection weakens, reducing their ability to use magical or investiture-based abilities. The power they sacrifice now is preserved for future use — but for now, they feel hollow.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping a nicrosil metalmind, enhancing their spiritual potential. Investiture flows through them more freely, amplifying their magical abilities and allowing for prolonged or more potent effects. They burn brighter — but it drains quickly.
